name: milk-cookie-manager
description: Cookie's best friend! Modern cookie manager.
author: Rafael Grigorian <rafael@grigorian.org>

scripts.prebuild:chrome: mkdir -p dist && cp -r static/* dist/ && jq -r 'del(.background.scripts)' static/manifest.json > dist/manifest.json
scripts.package:chrome: yarn clean && yarn build:chrome && web-ext build -s dist -a target
scripts.prebuild:firefox: mkdir -p dist && cp -r static/* dist/ && jq -r 'del(.background.service_worker,.offline_enabled,.incognito)' static/manifest.json > dist/manifest.json
scripts.package:firefox: yarn clean && yarn build:firefox && web-ext build -s dist -a target
scripts.test: yarn clean && yarn build:chrome && mocha spec
scripts.marketing: yarn clean && yarn build:chrome && node tools/create-marketing.js
